title: Gain CompTIA certification knowledge to raise your earning potential with this $65 CompTIA training collection
content:
Macworld

If you want to boost your resume or increase your earning potential, gaining comprehensive IT knowledge can open plenty of doors. Now, you can gain the needed knowledge and skills to pass CompTIA certification exams with help from IDUNOVA’s CompTIA training bundle. It’s on sale for only $64.97 (reg. $585) through January 28.

Created by IDUNOVA, an established leader in online IT education, this package features all the most updated 2024 training courses, so users can rest assured that their CompTIA studies include all the latest industry practices. 

Enjoy comprehensive training that can help earn you some of the most popular CompTIA certifications. With over 260 hours of instruction across 15 courses, students will gain a thorough understanding of critical CompTIA concepts and real-world applications to help them pass certification exams. Check out some of the courses below:

  • CompTIA A+ Core 1
  • CompTIA Server+
  • CompTIA LInux+
  • And much more!

Please note that the certification tests are not included with this bundle and must be taken separately. 

Leverage your earning potential with knowledge of the industry’s latest CompTIA practices.

Grab The Complete 2024 CompTIA Course Super Bundle by IDUNOVA for just $64.97 until January 28 at 11:59 p.m. PT. No coupon is needed for this best-of-web pricing.
